description: Accessibility (a11y) review items for WCAG 2.1 AA compliance

items.text: Associate labels with form inputs using htmlFor/id
items.reason: Screen readers need label association to announce field purpose

items.text: Provide clear error messages with aria-describedby
items.reason: Users need to understand what went wrong
Assistive technologies should announce required fields

items.text: Ensure form can be submitted with keyboard (Enter key)
items.reason: Keyboard-only users must be able to submit forms

items.text: Ensure all interactive elements are keyboard accessible
items.reason: Not all users can use a mouse
Keyboard users need to see where focus is

items.text: Use semantic HTML elements (button, a) instead of div with onClick

items.reason: Focus should move to modal and return when closed

items.text: Provide alt text for all meaningful images
items.reason: Screen reader users cannot see images

items.text: Use proper heading hierarchy (h1 > h2 > h3)
items.reason: Headings provide document structure for navigation

items.text: Ensure sufficient color contrast (4.5:1 for text)
items.reason: Low contrast text is hard to read

items.text: Use landmark regions (main, nav, aside, footer)
items.reason: Landmarks help screen reader users navigate
